posts.title: Fake Blog
posts.author: Andrew Nolan
posts.body: This is not a real blog, please ignore!

posts.title: Hello World!
posts.author: Andrew Nolan
posts.description: The first ever entry to my blogs
posts.body:
Hello World!

Much like a new programming language, I felt like the first thing I should do in a new blog is to start with a simple Hello World.his is mostly a place holder but I thought if I put something down I will be more likely to come back and write some real articles in 2021.

Wish me luck with that! And I hope to see you all back here in 2021!
